public void setModelGroupType(int modelGroupType)
Defines the variety of ModelGroup. A ModelGroup is either a <sequence>, <choice> or<
Parameters:

setContent

public void setContent(Component content)
                throws SchemaException
Sets the content of the ModelGroup. Concrete implementations of this interface ensure that the Component is legal.

The legal Component for a content is either an Element or an instanceof ModelGroup

getContent

public java.util.List getContent()
Returns a List of contents. Each element of the List is a Component.
Returns:
List of Components representing the content; returns null if the content is empty.
